content: संविधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To do, act, perform, manage, make. {@--2@} To dispose, arrange. {@--3@} To set, place, put, lay. {@--4@} To appoint. {@--5@} To direct, order. {@--6@} To attend to, mind {@--7@} To use, employ.
संविधा {@--1@} Arrangement, preparation, plan; <ls>R. 7. 16</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 17.</ls> {@--2@} Mode of life, means of leading life; कल्पावित्कल्पयामास वन्यामेवास्य संविधां <ls>R. 1. 94.</ls>
